extends java.lang.Object
    A class that encapsulates a Nashhorn script engine.
    Author:
    Ben M. Faul

      • JJS

        public JJS(java.lang.String init,
           java.lang.String exec)
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor providing exec and init functions.
        Parameters:
        init. - String - the code defining the init() function.
        exec. - String - the code defining the exec() function.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the evaluation throws an exception in the script engine.

        Call the init() function with an argument.
        Parameters:
        in. - Object. The input parameter.
        Returns:
        Object. The value of the return from the function.

      • exec

        public java.lang.Object exec(java.lang.String str)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute arbitrary string containing code.
        Parameters:
        str, - String - the code to execute.
        Returns:
        Object. The value (if any) of the return statement in the code (else null).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the evaluation throws an exception in the script engine.
